network.protocol

Enum ServerTypes

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<ServerTypes>
      • network.protocol.ServerTypes
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<ServerTypes>

    public enum ServerTypes
extends java.lang.Enum<ServerTypes>
    Enum of all protocol strings which can be received by the Server.
    Author:
    Christoph Hermann
    See Also:
    Server

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      ACCEPT_TRADE
      The type of message a Server receives when a Player wants to accept a trading offer.
      BUILD
      The type of message a Server receives when a Player wants to build a Construction.
      BUY_DEVLOPMENTCARD
      The type of message a Server receives when a Player wants to buy a DevelopmentCard.
      CANCEL_TRADE
      The type of message a Server receives when a Player wants to cancel a trade.
      END_TURN
      The type of message a Server receives when a Player wants to end their turn.
      FINISH_TRADE
      The type of message a Server receives when a User wants to finalize a trade.
      GAME_START
      The type of message a Server receives when a User is ready to start the game.
      HELLO
      The type of message a Server receives when a client connects.
      LOSE_RESOURCE
      The type of message a Server receives when a Player wants to discard resource cards.
      MOVE_ROBBER
      The type of message a Server receives when a Player wants to move the Robber.
      OFFER_TRADE
      The type of message a Server receives when a Player wants to make a trading offer.
      PLAY_KNIGHT
      The type of message a Server receives when a Player wants to play a knight card.
      PLAY_MONOPOLY
      The type of message a Server receives when a Player wants to play a Monopoly card.
      PLAY_ROAD_BUILDING
      The type of message a Server receives when a Player wants to play a Road Building card.
      PLAY_YEAR_OF_PLENTY
      The type of message a Server receives when a Player wants to play a Year Of Plenty card.
      PLAYER
      The type of message a Server receives when a User changes their name or color.
      ROLL_DICE
      The type of message a Server receives when a Player wants to roll the Dice.
      SEA_TRADING
      The type of message a Server receives when a Player wants to trade with the Bank.
      SEND_CHATMESSAGE
      The type of message a Server receives when a client wants to send a chat message.
